Package org.apache.cayenne.util

Interface PersistentObjectCollection<E>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Collection<E>, Iterable<E>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PersistentObjectList, PersistentObjectSet, ToManyList, ToManySet
    public interface PersistentObjectCollection<E>
extends Collection<E>
    Simple interface to unify PersistentObject* collections in way of setting properties directly
    Since:
    3.1
    See Also:
    ToManyMapProperty
